models package¶

Submodules¶

models.calendar module¶

models.calendar.composeEventId(member, reservation)¶

Compose a unique event id for Google Calendar.

member: dict

Member dict collected via RESTful API.

reservation: dict

Reservation dict collected via RESTful API.

str

A unique event id.

models.calendar.deleteEvent(credentials, member, reservation)¶

Delete the event from member’s Google Calendar

credentialsCredentials

Credentials acquired via OAuth process.

memberdict

Member dict collected via RESTful API.

reservation :dict

Reservation dict collected via RESTful API.

models.calendar.insertEvent(credentials, member, car, reservation)¶

Insert an event to member’s Google Calendar.

credentialsCredentials

Credentials acquired via OAuth process.

memberdict

Member dict collected via RESTful API.

cardict

Car dict collected via RESTful API.

reservation :dict

Reservation dict collected via RESTful API.

models.rest module¶

models.rest.get(endpoint, params=None)¶

Wrapper to call RESTful API via requests GET method.

endpointstr

RESTful endpoint.

paramsdict (optional)

Query string data.

dict

The data part of RESTful API response structure.

models.rest.post(endpoint, data=None)¶

Wrapper to call RESTful API via requests POST method.

endpointstr

RESTful endpoint.

paramsdict (optional)

Payload data.

dict

The data part of RESTful API response structure.

models.rest.put(endpoint, data=None)¶

Wrapper to call RESTful API via requests PUT method.

endpointstr

RESTful endpoint.

paramsdict (optional)

Payload data.

dict

The data part of RESTful API response structure.

models.security module¶

models.security.hashPassword(password)¶

Encrypt password

passwordstr

Password in plaintext.

str

Ciphertext of the encrypted password.

models.security.legitimateClient(ip)¶

Check if client is legitimate.

ipstr

Client IP address.

bool

True if client is legitimate. Otherwise, False.

models.security.verifyPassword(username, password, noPassword=False)¶

Verify username and password.

username: str

Member’s username.

password: str

Member’s password.

noPassword: bool (optional)

Verify username only.

bool

True if passed. Otherwise, False.

models.security.verifySession(sess)¶

Check if the session is valid

sessdict

Flask session structure.

dict

Member dict if session is valid. Otherwise, None.

models.socket_utils module¶

models.socket_utils.recvJson(socket)¶

Receive a JSON string via socket and covert it back to original object

socketsocket

Network socket.

object

An object sent from the other end of socket connection.

models.socket_utils.sendJson(socket, object)¶

Covert the object into JSON string and sent it off via socket.

socketsocket

Network socket.

objectobject

An object that can be JOSNified.

models.webdata module¶

models.webdata.castInput(dataType, data)¶

Cast input data to a specified data type.

dataTypetype

Target data type.

datastr

The original data string.

type

The value represents the input data in target data type.

models.webdata.convertLocalToUtc(dt)¶

Convert datetime object from local to UTC time zone

dtdatetime

A datetime object with local time zone

datetime

A datetime object with UTC time zone

models.webdata.convertUtcToLocal(dt)¶

Convert datetime object from UTC to local time zone

dtdatetime

A datetime object with UTC time zone

datetime

A datetime object with local time zone

models.webdata.datetimeToStr(dt)¶

Convert a datetime object to a time string.

dtdatetime

A datetime object.

str

A time string.

models.webdata.parseInput(rawParams, keyTypes)¶

Parse raw paramters and cast all desired fields to proper data types.

rawParamsdict

A parameter dict normally passed in from RESTful API callers.

dict

A sanitised parameter dict.

models.webdata.statusToStr(status)¶

Quick mapping between status numbers and human readable strings.

statusint

Status number.

str

A human readable string.

models.webdata.strToDatetime(s)¶

Convert a time string to a datetime object.

sstr

A time string.
